title: Singapore ‘at heart of Act East Policy,’ says EAM Jaishankar during meeting with Vivian Bala
description: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar held a meeting with his Singapore counterpart Vivian Bala on Sunday. He stated that Singapore is at the heart of India's 'Act East Policy.' Jaishankar is on a visit to Singapore. During his visit, Jaishankar will meet Singapore's leadership as part of the regul...
